articles.description: Alaska Airlines wants you to fly with them -- so much so, that they're willing to dance for you. The airline showed off its Covid-19 safety precautions with a new music video.

articles.title: Doctor learns she lost patient while on her way to get vaccine
articles.description: As Dr. Valerie Briones-Pryor was on her way to get the Covid-19 vaccine, she learned she lost her 27th patient to the virus. She speaks with CNN's Dana Bash about the experience.

articles.author: Sonia Moghe, CNN
articles.title: Ghislaine Maxwell seeks release from jail on a proposed $28.5 million bail package
articles.description: Ghislaine Maxwell, accused of being an accomplice to alleged sex trafficker Jeffrey Epstein, is asking to be released on a proposed $28.5 million bail package, according to court documents.

articles.author: Lindsay Isaac and Sharon Braithwaite, CNN
articles.title: Hungary passes anti-LGBTQ law effectively barring same-sex couples from adopting
articles.description: Hungary's parliament has voted to redefine the concept of "family" in the country's constitution, a move that will effectively bar same sex couples from adopting children. The move has been met with outcry from human rights groups and LGBTQ advocates.

articles.author: Rishi Iyengar, CNN Business
articles.title: Twitter is shutting down Periscope
articles.description: More than five years after being acquired by Twitter before it officially launched, Periscope is shutting down.

articles.author: Travis Caldwell, CNN
articles.title: As she was getting the Covid-19 vaccine, this doctor found out she'd lost her 27th patient to the virus
articles.description: A Kentucky doctor learns as she receives the new vaccine that her 27th Covid-19 patient dies, and tells CNN she has hope for the new vaccine but needs the public's help to stop the spread.
articles.content:
(CNN)Dr. Valerie Briones-Pryor was among the first in Kentucky to receive the new Pfizer Covid-19 vaccine Monday, but she describes the moment as "bittersweet."

articles.title: Dozens of members of Congress call on Biden to end the federal death penalty
articles.description: More than three dozen members of Congress are calling on Joe Biden's incoming administration to prioritize abolishing the death penalty in all jurisdictions, according to a letter sent Tuesday to the transition team for the President-elect and Vice President-…

articles.author: Giulia Heyward and AJ Willingham, CNN
articles.title: First came news of a vaccine. Now come the scams.
articles.description: The newly-approved Pfizer/BioNTech vaccine is slowly making its way across the US. But those eagerly waiting their turn need to beware of dangerous scams and misinformation about the vaccine's distribution.

articles.author: Eric Bradner, CNN
articles.title: Biden blasts Georgia's GOP senators, saying they 'stood by' as Trump tried to undo state's election results
articles.description: President-elect Joe Biden on Tuesday slammed Georgia's two Republican senators, saying that David Perdue and Kelly Loeffler "stood by" and "fully embraced nullifying nearly 5 million Georgia votes."

articles.title: Why does Pete Buttigieg want to be transportation secretary?
articles.description: Quick: Name President Donald Trump's transportation secretary. Chances are you can't. (It's Elaine Chao, who also happens to be married to Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell.) Which says something about the profile of the average transportation secretary.…

articles.author: Nicquel Terry Ellis, CNN
articles.title: Nearly one third of Black Americans remain hesitant to get Covid-19 vaccine, study finds
articles.description: As the first Covid-19 vaccinations are being administered across the country this week, Black Americans remain among the groups that have the least confidence in the vaccine, according to a study from the Kaiser Family Foundation.

articles.author: Allen Kim, CNN
articles.title: Giannis Antetokounmpo signs largest deal in NBA history with Milwaukee Bucks
articles.description: NBA superstar Giannis Antetokounmpo, 26, agreed to sign a five-year contract extension with the Milwaukee Bucks on Tuesday. The supermax deal is worth $228.2 million and is the largest deal in NBA history.

articles.author: Jazmin Goodwin, CNN Business
articles.title: MacKenzie Scott donates $4.2 billion to 384 organizations, focusing on the underserved
articles.description: MacKenzie Scott announced on Tuesday her second major charitable contribution of the year, giving away nearly $4.2 billion to 384 organizations as part of a plan to donate a majority of her fortune.
